mapper.select: SELECT BA.loginID AS 'loginId', BA.MODEL_CODE AS 'modelCode', PF.PD_NADD AS 'pdNadd', PD.PD_NAME AS 'pdName', PD.PD_PRICE AS 'pdPrice', BA.B_AMT AS 'baAmt', (PD.PD_PRICE * BA.B_AMT) AS 'total', BA.B_WISHDATE AS 'baWishdate' FROM BASKET BA RIGHT OUTER JOIN PD_INFO PD ON BA.MODEL_CODE = PD.MODEL_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN PD_FILE PF ON PD.PDFILE_CODE = PF.PDFILE_CODE WHERE BA.loginID = #{loginId}
SELECT (BA.B_AMT * PD.PD_PRICE) AS 'BASKETTOTAL' FROM BASKET BA INNER JOIN PD_INFO PD ON BA.MODEL_CODE = PD.MODEL_CODE WHERE BA.loginID = #{loginId} GROUP BY BA.loginID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JORDER_INFO (JORD_CODE, MODEL_CODE, loginID, JORD_NO, JORD_DATE, JORD_IN, JORD_WISHDATE, JORD_AMT) VALUES (#{jordCode}, #{modelCode}, #{loginId}, #{jordNo}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), #{jordIn}, #{jordWishdate}, #{jordAmt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BASKET WHERE loginID = #{loginId} AND MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}
